name: hubspot-get-started-project
description: Basic example of a UI Extension built with HubSpot's React developer tools

scripts.postinstall: cd ./src/app/extensions/ && npm install && cd ../app.functions && npm install
scripts.dev: hs accounts use 'UKIO|Sandbox' && hs project upload
scripts.prod: hs accounts use 'Ukio' && hs project upload

author: HubSpot
